rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: So far, the virus hasn't made the changes that would enable it to become a fully human pathogen, said Dr. Michael Osterholm, who directs the Center for Infectious Disease Research and Policy at the University of Minnesota. It's [It becoming a fully human pathogen] unclear whether it [it becoming a fully human pathogen] ever will.
